snpGeneSets 2.0
  • Reference

Get genes belonging to a given category of gene set or pathway

getSetGenes.Rd

Given a particular gene-set category, the function will get a integer vector of entrez gene ID that belongs to the category.

Usage

getSetGenes(setType = 2)

Arguments

setType

'setType' is a integer or numeric value of gene-set category at [0,20]. The complete list of 'setType' can be obtained by function 'getSetType'.

Details

The gene sets/pathways of MSigDB (http://www.broadinstitute.org/gsea/msigdb/collections.jsp) are classified into different categories. The detailed information for all gene-set categories can be obtained through 'getSetType' function.

Value

A integer vector of Entrez gene id that belongs to the given set/pathway category.

References

http://www.broadinstitute.org/gsea/msigdb/collections.jsp

Author

H Mei; L Li

Note

See also

getSetType, getGeneSetInfo

Examples

# setGenes0<-getSetGenes(0)
# length(setGenes0)
# head(setGenes0)

# setGenes2<-getSetGenes(2)
# length(setGenes2)
# head(setGenes2)
